name: OneShot: Arena
description:
One Shot: Arena, shooter where every weapon has only one shot

OS:A is a challenging fast paced shooter with very high movement speed, searching for keys and powerful weapons, however, all weapons have only one shot, before they vanish from your hands.

Your goal in each level is to find the exit, be aware though, as there are a few detours filled with enemies and powerful weapons.

The limited ammo often means you have to dodge bullets instead of gunning down the first thing you see.

There is also a Zombie Horde mode, where you go up against infinite wave of zombies, with item dispensers spawning items every 15 seconds.
